original_text: We wait to receive all the good things that he has prepared for us. Nobody can ever destroy those things. Nothing can spoil them. They will never become old or less beautiful. God is keeping those things in heaven for you.
korean_text: 썩지 않고 더럽지 않고 쇠하지 아니하는 유업을 잇게 하시나니 곧 너희를 위하여 하늘에 간직하신 것이라

sentences.original_text: We wait to receive all the good things
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 모든 좋은 것들을 받기 위해 기다립니다

sentences.original_text: that he has prepared for us

sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그것들을 당신을 위해 하늘에 보관하고 계십니다
